name: Vendor Lock-in Anti-Pattern
description: Over-dependence on specific vendor products making migration difficult or impossible
when_to_use:
Heavy reliance on proprietary features
Vendor-specific implementations throughout code
Lack of abstraction layers
drawbacks:
Migration difficulty
Reduced negotiating power
Technology lock-in
Innovation constraints
use_cases:
Direct database vendor API usage
Cloud provider specific services
Proprietary framework dependencies
